mapper.insert: insert into report(reporter, reportedUser, category, content, detail, PostIdx, CommentIdx) values( #{reporter}, #{reportedUser}, #{category}, #{content}, COALESCE(#{detail}, ''), COALESCE(#{PostIdx}, 0), COALESCE(#{CommentIdx}, 0) );
mapper.select: select * from report where reporter=#{reporter} and PostIdx=#{PostIdx} and CommentIdx=#{CommentIdx} and category=#{category} LIMIT 1
select * from report order by reportIdx desc
